Usage¶

Installation¶

To use conllu-path, first install it using pip:

(.venv) $ pip install lark
(.venv) $ pip install -i https://test.pypi.org/simple/ conllu-path-shartular

Loading conllu files¶

To iterate through the sentences in a conllu file, you can use the conllu_path.iter_sentences_from_conllu(filename) function:

conllu_path.iter_sentences_from_conllu(file: TextIO | str) → Generator[Sentence, None, None]¶

Returns an iterator of sentences from the conllu file

Parameters:

file – filename or string buffer.

Returns:

Generator of sentences.

Return type:

Generator[Sentence, None, None]

conllu-path
